welcome.title: Welcome to your CV workspace!
welcome.description: We'll guide you through the different sections to create a professional CV. You can skip this tutorial at any time or restart it from the help button.

navbar.title: Main navigation
navbar.description: Use this navigation bar to access different application features.

cvNavigation.title: CV Navigation
cvNavigation.description: Navigate between different CV sections to organize your information.

progress.title: Track your progress
progress.description: This bar shows your advancement. Each completed section increases your percentage. Aim for 100% for a complete CV!

import.title: Import your existing CV
import.description: Already have a CV? Use this feature to automatically analyze it and pre-fill your information. Supports PDF and Word files.

sidebar.title: Section navigation
sidebar.description: Navigate between different CV sections. Green dots indicate completed sections. Click on a section to access it directly.

personalInfo.title: Start with your information
personalInfo.description: First fill in your personal information: name, email, phone, etc. This is the foundation of your CV. You can also add a professional photo.

navigation.title: Navigate between sections
navigation.description: Use these buttons to move from one section to another. The 'Next' button is only enabled when the current section is completed. At the end, you'll be able to choose a design!

tabbar.title: Mobile navigation
tabbar.description: On mobile, use this bar to quickly navigate between sections.

hero.title: Your intelligent professional guide
hero.description: Create impactful resumes, get personalized career advice, and prepare for interviews with our cutting-edge AI assistant

cv_designer.title: CV Designer Pro
cv_designer.description: Create professional resumes with our premium templates and export in high-quality PDF.

career_advisor.title: AI Career Advisor
career_advisor.description: Get personalized advice for your professional development.

cover_letter.title: Cover Letter
cover_letter.description: Generate impactful cover letters tailored to your applications.

interview_coach.title: Interview Coach
interview_coach.description: Prepare for your interviews with our intelligent interactive simulation.

cta_image.title: Boost your career with Guidy
cta_image.description: Our AI assistant analyzes your profile and guides you towards opportunities that match your journey. Create your optimized resume now.

cta.badge: The assistant that guides you to success

student.name: Engineering Student Profile
student.description: Recent engineering graduate with a strong academic foundation in software development and machine learning. Proficient in Python, Java, and C++. Completed multiple real-world projects including a predictive analytics system that improved efficiency by 25%. Seeking a challenging role where I can apply my technical skills and innovative mindset to develop cutting-edge solutions.

archivist.name: Professional Archivist Profile
archivist.description: Detail-oriented archivist with 8 years of experience in document management and preservation. Expert in developing efficient cataloging systems and implementing digital archiving solutions. Advanced knowledge of industry-standard software and metadata frameworks. Strong track record of improving accessibility while maintaining strict compliance with confidentiality regulations.

beginner.name: Versatile Professional Profile
beginner.description: Motivated professional with a diverse skill set spanning project management, customer service, and data analysis. Fast learner who adapts quickly to new environments and technologies. Excellent communication skills with a proven ability to collaborate across departments. Dedicated to delivering high-quality results and contributing positively to team objectives.
